SELECT MAX(member_code) AS maxMemberCode FROM memberinfo
and store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(mm.sid) FROM memberinfo mem JOIN msg_member mm ON mm.member_sid = mem.sid WHERE mm.msg_sid = #{massSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and mem.store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
